knimeNode.name: MVLRGraph
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node provides a 3D representation to obtain a visual "closeness of fit" test when provided a co-efficients table output by an upstream multivariate linear regression node.

option.name: short name of first option (like in the dialog)
short name of second option (like in the dialog)

ports.inPort: Takes in the output coefficient table produced by a regression node (linear/polynomial).

Takes in the data corresponding to the regression function produced in the regression node. Columns must match the output coeffiecients columns. Can either take the training data table (which was porocessed by the regression node) or the test data (for a visual representation of function "fitness").
ports.outPort: Outputs the input data table (not the coefficient table).
